Load data from local file:
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
#cost sets
paymentandvalue <- read.csv("~/Documents/Harvard/CS107 Big Data/Final Project/Payment_and_value_of_care_-_Hospital.csv") #national
inpatientcost <- read.csv("~/Documents/Harvard/CS107 Big Data/Final Project/Hospital_Inpatient_Cost_Transparency__Beginning_2009.csv") #NYS

#risk of badness sets
PCIbyhosptial <- read.csv("~/Documents/Harvard/CS107 Big Data/Final Project/Cardiac_Surgery_and_Percutaneous_Coronary_Interventions_by_Hospital___Beginning_2008.csv") #NYS
hospitalinfection <- read.csv("~/Documents/Harvard/CS107 Big Data/Final Project/Hospital-Acquired_Infections__Beginning_2008.csv") #NYS
complicationshospital <- read.csv("~/Documents/Harvard/CS107 Big Data/Final Project/Complications_-_Hospital.csv") #national

#service
hcahps <- read.csv("~/Documents/Harvard/CS107 Big Data/Final Project/Patient_survey__HCAHPS__-_Hospital.csv") #national
timely <- read.csv("~/Documents/Harvard/CS107 Big Data/Final Project/Timely_and_Effective_Care_-_Hospital.csv") #national

#readmisisons
readmission <- read.csv("~/Documents/Harvard/CS107 Big Data/Final Project/Hospital_Readmissions_Reduction_Program.csv") #national 
mortality <- read.csv("~/Documents/Harvard/CS107 Big Data/Final Project/Readmissions_Complications_and_Deaths_-_Hospital.csv") #national
```

##Wrangling
Limit Data Sets to NYS only:
```{r}
paymentandvalue <- paymentandvalue %>% filter(State=="NY")
```
